description:
After Dark Matter attacks the distant Ripple Star's crystal, the young Ribbon attempts to flee with the crystal to save it.
The crystal shattered, stranding Ribbon in Dream Land. Now it's up to Kirby and friends to travel the galaxy in order to
restore the shattered crystal, and bring peace to the world.

k64_0.1.1.title: Kirby 64 - The Crystal Shards APWorld v0.1.1

k64_0.1.2.title: Kirby 64 - The Crystal Shards APWorld v0.1.2

k64_0.1.3.description:
# Features
* Current level/stage information is now passed to data storage
* New Kirby Flavors!
  * Blueberry
  * Lemon
  * Kiwi

# Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where undefined behavior could occur after completing a stage, such as randomly gaining crystals, copy abilities being revoked, or infinite death loops
k64_0.1.3.title: Kirby 64 - The Crystal Shards APWorld v0.1.3

k64_0.1.4.description:
# Features
* New Kirby Flavors!
  * Lime
  * Bubblegum

# Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where boss access would always be granted when moving across levels with at least one Crystal Shard.
k64_0.1.4.title: Kirby 64 - The Crystal Shards APWorld v0.1.4

k64_0.2.0.description:
# New Features
* Waddle Dee, Adeleine, and King Dedede are now shuffled into the item pool!
  * WARNING: friend logic is currently unstable. For multiworlds needing logic safety, it is recommended to put them in your start inventory
* Untested support for roms in `.n64` and `.v64` formats.
* Added support for start inventory from pool
* 46 New. Kirby. Flavors.
  * Cherry
  * Grape
  * Chocolate
  * Marshmallow
  * Licorice
  * Watermelon
  * Orange
  * Citrus
  * Wafer
  * Ice
  * Cream
  * Snowcone
  * Cotton Candy
  * Chocomint
  * Cheeseburger
  * Rose
  * Daisy
  * Lavender (previous Lavender has been renamed to Lilac)
  * Blue Poppy
  * Fuschia
  * Canary
  * Carbon
  * Snow
  * Ivory
  * Chalk
  * Sapphire
  * Emerald
  * Gameboy
  * Halloween
  * Bright
  * Ocean
  * Rin
  * Len
  * Luka
  * MEIKO
  * KAITO
  * Mirror
  * Dedede
  * Waddle Dee
  * Susie
  * Mogeko
  * Link
  * Callie
  * Marie
  * Pearl
  * Marina

# Bug Fixes
* Now capable of generating on Archipelago version 0.6.0
k64_0.2.0.title: Kirby 64 - The Crystal Shards APWorld v0.2.0

k64_0.2.1.title: Kirby 64 - The Crystal Shards APWorld v0.2.1

k64_0.2.1r2.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fixed Waddle Dee crashing the game when you meet him in Aqua Star and Shiver Star
* Fixed Dedede in Aqua Star requiring Waddle Dee, and then also choosing to do nothing anyways.
* Fixed Dedede in Ripple Star not appearing.
k64_0.2.1r2.title: Kirby 64 - The Crystal Shards APWorld v0.2.1

k64_0.2.2.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where Dedede would *still* not show up in Ripple Star 2
* Fixed an issue where Miracle Matter would only grant access to Dark Star if you were missing one of your friends
* Fixed logic interactions between friend shuffle and copy ability access
* Fixed Dedede not being logically required for Aqua Star 3
k64_0.2.2.title: Kirby 64 - The Crystal Shards APWorld v0.2.2

k64_0.3.0.description:
# New Features:
* 1-Ups, Food, and Stars can now be added as checks! 
* New receivable items: Small Star (adds a single point to current score), Ice Cream/Sandwich/Meat/Cake (restores 1 health).
* The stage select menu now reflects currently received friends.
* If a friend is required for further progression/a shard in the stage, that friend will now be missing if not obtained.

# Other Changes:
* `total_crystals` has been renamed to `max_crystals` to match KDL3.
* Single player generation can now only require up to 90% of the total crystal count due to fill errors.
* Added manifest.

# Bug Fixes
* Client now works on source.
* Fixed the DeathLink tag not being registered.
* Fixed an issue where defeating Miracle Matter would leave the save in an invalid state, and progression to Dark Star would be blocked because of it
* Fixed an issue where in certain circumstances, credit for defeating Zero-Two would not be granted.
* Fixed logic not requiring Waddle Dee for Shiver Star 1 outside of the first shard
* Fixed logic not requiring Lightsaber for Shiver Star 4's 2nd shard
* The client no longer processes goal/items/locations on file select.
k64_0.3.0.title: Kirby 64 - The Crystal Shards APWorld v0.3.0

k64_0.3.1.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Now compatible with the Ares core in Bizhawk
* The following locations now send properly
  * Rock Star 2 - Star 10
  * Aqua Star 3 - Star 20
  * Neo Star 1 - Cake 2
  * Neo Star 1 - Ice Cream 2
  * Shiver Star 1 - Star 17
* Aqua Star 3 - Star 27 was removed (it never existed in the first place)
* Logic for Rock Star 2 Dedede stars was being falsely applied to all of the stars within Rock Star 4
* Missing Dedede logic for food within Shiver Star 4 has been added
* Deathlink is now actually functional
* Fixed a typo within the Consumables option description
k64_0.3.1.title: Kirby 64 - The Crystal Shards APWorld v0.3.1

k64_v0.1.0.title: Kirby 64 - The Crystal Shards APWorld v0.1.0
